bug.author: i02fesea
bug.summary: Labels are positioned in the wrong location after Active Learning using FasterRcnn
bug.description: Hi everyone, I am training a model defining the dimension size 300x300 and using pictures size 224x171. I load the pictures and run the active learning option. The active learning works fine, but the labels are positioned in the wrong location. The x axis is fine, but the y axis is offset to a wrong location. I think that there is a problem calculating the borders. I would appreciate any help! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12471064/45301445-44e91e80-b511-11e8-8f40-bf51ae32cd5a.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Are you using the latest release this should be resolved try the dev branch
Yes this issues is related to previous version (v1) of VoTT. Could you please try again with v2 and eventually re-submit an issue with updated info? Thanks
